title: [ENG SUB]【三明治開球花絮搶先看】 立昂四次元大膽告白！星辰黑人問號【Between】Behind the Scenes

json.text: Who is gonna pitch the ball?
I am! I fear so much that I'll throw a wild pitch

The wind is being affectionate and smiling  (*Song)
(OST Opening Theme"The Sandwich Girl" sung by Maggie Chiang)
It gives me a big hug (*Song)
The next second I'll have made a promise with happiness(*Song)
So I'll meet it in no time (*Song)
Thank you
May I take a photo with him only?
(Impossible!)
I'm gonna practice pitching

As if I were layer stuffings in a sanswich (*Song)
(OST Opening Theme"The Sandwich Girl" sung by Maggie Chiang)
I won't escape  (*Song)
(Everybody is trying to hold Marcus! HaHaHaHa )

Let my heart feel it  (*Song)
(OST Opening Theme"The Sandwich Girl" sung by Maggie Chiang)

I'm not their cup of tea! (Crying)
(Marcus is laughing up her sleeve )
Every encounter I never figure out on the way (*Song)
Just hold hands, ok?

What about carrying her in my arms to play ball
Xiao Qing: No!
He was trembling when he carried me in his arms that day
I exercised before we met, so the director...
Really?

I don't think I was trembling
Xiao Qing: Yes, you were!

Let my heart feel it (*Song)
(OST Opening Theme"The Sandwich Girl" sung by Maggie Chiang)
The small dream gets closer and closer to me day by day  (*Song)
Let my heart feel it (*Song)
That every time I pass you by on the way is unforgettable (*Song)
Lousy!!!
What?
Let my heart feel it (*Song)
The small dream is coming true day by day  (*Song)

Netizens on our live stream say  they want to see
how you scrape the cuticle for the ball

What? The live streaming is still on?
Isn't it over?

You weren't fooled!
Don't you want to say something, Marcus?
What's going on?
I love you!
What?!
